item.title: Typhoon moves away from Philippines after killing two
item.description: Fung-wong, which hit the Philippines as a super typhoon and later weakened, is expected to move to Taiwan.

item.title: Sex schedules and curiosity: How I keep my relationship alive
item.description: How bringing fresh conversation and perspectives into a relationship can help keep it alive.

item.title: China exempts chips used by carmakers from export curbs
item.description: The block on exports of the company's chips had raised fears that European car production would be hit.

item.title: Homelessness higher than official figures, research shows
item.description: Official data for England underestimates the scale of the problem, according to research for charity Crisis says.

item.title: The Papers: 'BBC bosses quit in disgrace' and 'Tears of the crown'
item.description: The resignations of BBC director general Tim Davie and his head of news Deborah Turness dominate Monday's papers.
